talk_29:
<snd:TalkPositive_00>I received it from Princess Zelda. I have
now passed it on to you.
talk_56:
<snd:Happy_00>The <clr:0000>Temple of Time<clr:ffff> is visible
from here.
talk_57:
But no more. Now it is a lonely place.
No one visits.
talk_58:
It was used in the distant past. Many rites
and ceremonies of the kingdom were
held there.
talk_27:
<snd:Greeting_01><clr:0000>Link<clr:ffff>. I have waited for you.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> left something for you in
my care.
talk_28:
<snd:TalkPositive_01>This is the <clr:0000>Purah Pad<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I am told it is an invaluable tool that will
provide you with direction.
talk_30:
My records indicate that Princess Zelda is
waiting at the location marked on its <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>.
